channel.title: Pages on Albert Armea
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Albert Armea

item.title: About
item.description: I make things – usually software, but sometimes also hardware, videos, and music. On this site, I document the process of making these things and interesting (and occasionally unrelated) adventures that happen along the way. You can also find me on: GitHub YouTube Reddit Keybase LinkedIn … or you can send me an email. My resume can be found here. Site This site is generated with Hugo using a modified version of the Minos theme and hosted by GitHub Pages.
